ABOUT.QUOTE: "To be successful, it is necessary to truly love what you do. Otherwise, considering only the rational side, you'll  simply give up. This is what happens to most people."
ABOUT.SQUARE1: Developer with more than 5 years of experience, graduated from Senac SP and with knowledge of current market technologies.
ABOUT.SQUARE2: Expert in the Angular framework, which has developed many websites and internal systems.
ABOUT.SQUARE3: He is currently studying English and related technology courses. His next goal is to do a graduate degree in "Big Data" or "Artificial Intelligence."
ABOUT.SQUARE4: Some of his hobbies are drawing, traveling and logical thinking games :P
